That every time you snap your fingers they must look at the direction of the sound, which command takes priority? Is it the oldest command, or is it the newest command? All questions That I pose to myself and others. The lore we gained from this chapter is very important and changes everything.

My theories get blown away everytime there is a new installment of this series, how could I be so daft. Overlapping hypnosis brings with it some serious questions about the world building the series has shown up to this point. I have some major questions that I just need to pose to clear my mind, one, if one can overlap hypnosis commands then does the same rule about the number of times one can be under hypnosis apply? As is shown in the lore the number of times hypnosis works on a person until they gain resistance to it is four, but with overlapping hypnosis does the count decrease however many times hypnosis is used in rapid succession or does it take time for the mind to gain a tolerance? If the case is the latter than what happens if you provide a paradoxical hypnosis? Say you give the command that you will stay staring at a wall no matter what happens no matter what anyone says, including the hypnotiser until the hypnosis is over, then you give the command (continued in next post)
